name: get_latest_teammates_df
description: Retrieves a DataFrame of all teammates' performance from the latest match of a specified League of Legends player.

player_name.description: The Discord username mapped to the player's Riot PUUID.

name: search_youtube
description: Searches for relevant YouTube videos based on a query.

query.description: The search query for finding relevant YouTube videos.

max_results.description: Maximum number of video URLs to return.

name: get_puuid_from_discord
description: Looks up a player's Riot PUUID using their Discord username.

username.description: The Discord username of the player.
